pullrequest.title: Fix BulletHingeJoint limits when child link has off-diagonal inertia

content.raw: After looking more at that test, it definitely appears to be unrelated to this PR. It seems there may have been some changes to sdf 1.4, and we need to update the test to reflect that. We should take care of that in a separate PR, though.
content.html: After looking more at that test, it definitely appears to be unrelated to this PR. It seems there may have been some changes to sdf 1.4, and we need to update the test to reflect that. We should take care of that in a separate PR, though.
